title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Observational Learning-Based Leadership Development from a Relational Leadership Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain key processes of observational learning (attention, motivation, social comparison, etc.) within a relational leadership perspective
Learners can analyze diverse leadership contexts to evaluate and implement observational learning applications
Learners can establish personal leadership development plans by observing and comparing peer leaders' cases in digital learning environments
Learners can design leadership behavior change strategies reflecting observational learning effects over time
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
